name: Scrapyard Robot Rampage
description: Fight for the survival in a stylized world, where death is the only guarantee.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1+ Processor: Intel i3-6100, AMD Phenom II X4 955 Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 142 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-8400, AMD Ryzen 5 1600 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650ti, AMD Radeon HD 7790 Storage: 150 MB available space
